# f5distributedcloud_virtual_k8s (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_virtual_k8s` resource manages Virtual Kubernetes clusters in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Virtual Kubernetes provides managed Kubernetes namespaces across distributed sites.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_virtual_k8s" "example" {
  name        = "my-vk8s"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Virtual Kubernetes for application workloads"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
